text: Ladislav Hučko (16 February 1948 – 14 January 2025) was a Slovak hierarch of the Ruthenian Greek Catholic Church. He was the Apostolic Exarch of the Czech Republic from 2003 to 2025. Hučko died in Prague, Czech Republic on 14 January 2025, at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at Catholic-Hierarchy.org * Profile at GCatholic.org Category:1948 births Category:2025 deaths
title: Ladislav Hučko
